snippet: A Stanford University study questions advantages of organic food, a reminder that strokes aren't just for older people, coping at the airport without a wallet and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: A Stanford University study questions advantages of organic food, a reminder that strokes aren't just for older people, coping at the airport without a wallet and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Tuesday Reading: A Study Questions the Advantages of Organic Food
